meta.title: Eurostat - Your gateway to European statistics
meta.description: Eurostat is the statistical office of the European Union situated in Luxembourg. We provide high quality statistics and data on Europe.
meta.keywords: eurostat, statistics, european union, data, economy, demographics, statistics office
